get.summary: Retrieves the weekly attendance of an employee by their ID.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the attendance details if successful, or 404 Not Found if no attendance records are found.

post.description: This method allows an employee to clock in. It returns 200 OK if the clock-in is successful, or 400 Bad Request if the operation fails.
This method allows an employee to clock out. It returns 200 OK if the clock-out is successful, or 400 Bad Request if the operation fails.

get.summary: Retrieves the attendance records of employees within a specified date range for a manager.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the attendance details if successful, or 400 Bad Request if no attendance records are found.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date of the date range.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the date range.

get.summary: Retrieves the attendance records of employees within a specified date range for a employee.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the attendance details if successful, or 400 Bad Request if no attendance records are found.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date of the date range.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the date range.

get.summary: Retrieves all employees managed by a specific manager.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the employee data if successful, or 404 Not Found if no employees are found.

get.summary: Retrieves the profile of an employee by their ID.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the profile if successful, or 404 Not Found if the profile is not found.

post.summary: Authenticates an employee or manager using their email and password, and logs them into the portal.
post.description: This method returns 200 OK with a token if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the login fails.

get.summary: Retrieves the employees managed by a specific manager who are present on the current day.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the employee data if successful, or 404 Not Found if no employees are found.

post.summary: Logs out the currently authenticated user from the portal, invalidating their session or token.
post.description:
This method invalidates the user's authentication token or session, effectively logging them out.
It typically returns 200 OK upon successful invalidation.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of employees who are absent on the current date, filtered by manager.
get.description:
This endpoint requires the user to have the 'Manager' role.
It queries the database for employees who are not marked as present for the current day.

get.summary: Retrieves the role information for the current user or system.
get.description:
This endpoint requires the user to have one of the following roles:
'MaintenanceEngineer', 'Developer', 'NetworkEngineer', 'DevOpsEngineer',
'DatabaseAdministrator', 'Tester', or 'Manager'.
It delegates the retrieval of role information to the employee service.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of annual holidays.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the holiday data if successful, or 404 Not Found if no holidays are found.

get.summary: Retrieves the list of the next five upcoming holidays.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the holiday data if successful, or 404 Not Found if no holidays are found.

get.summary: Retrieves the leave balance of an employee by their ID.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the leave balance if successful, or 404 Not Found if no leave balance is found.

get.summary: Retrieves the leave request status of an employee by their ID.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the leave request status if successful, or 404 Not Found if no status is found.

get.summary: Retrieves the pending leave requests of employees managed by a specific manager.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the leave request data if successful, or 404 Not Found if no requests are found.

put.summary: Approves a leave request by its ID, approved by the manager who manages the employee.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the approval fails.

parameters.name: LeaveId
parameters.description: The ID of the leave request to approve.

put.summary: Rejects a leave request by its ID, rejected by the manager who manages the employee.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the rejection fails.

parameters.name: LeaveId
parameters.description: The ID of the leave request to reject.

put.summary: Cancels a leave request by the employee, only if the status is pending.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the cancellation fails.

parameters.name: LeaveRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the leave request to cancel.

post.summary: Submits a leave request by the employee.
post.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the submission fails.

put.summary: Updates leave request details by the employee, only if the status is pending.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the update fails.

parameters.name: leaveId
parameters.description: The ID of the leave request to update, provided in the query string.

requestBody.description: The updated leave request details provided in the request body.

get.summary: Retrieves the employees report for the current manager.
Retrieves all shifts for an employee by their ID.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 404 Not Found if the employee or shifts are not found.

get.summary: Retrieves all shifts for employees managed by a specific manager.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 404 Not Found if no employees or shifts are found.

post.summary: Assigns shifts to an employee by the manager.
post.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the assignment fails.

requestBody.description: The shift details provided in the request body.

put.summary: Updates the assigned shifts for an employee by the manager.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the update fails.

requestBody.description: The updated shift details provided in the request body.

get.summary: Retrieves the shift swap status for an employee by their ID.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 404 Not Found if the retrieval fails.

get.summary: Retrieves all shift swap requests for employees managed by a specific manager.
get.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 404 Not Found if the retrieval fails.

put.summary: Approves a shift swap request by it's ID, approved by the manager who manages the employee.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the approval fails.

parameters.name: ShiftSwapRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the shift swap request to approve, provided in the query string.

put.summary: Rejects a shift swap request by it's ID, rejected by the manager who manages the employee.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the rejection fails.

parameters.name: ShiftSwapRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the shift swap request to reject, provided in the query string.

put.summary: Cancels a shift swap request by the employee, only if the status is pending.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the cancellation fails.

parameters.name: ShiftSwapRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the shift swap request to cancel, provided in the query string.

put.summary: Updates a shift swap request details by the employee, only if the status is pending.
put.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the update fails.

parameters.name: ShiftSwapRequestId
parameters.description: The ID of the shift swap request to update, provided in the query string.

requestBody.description: The updated shift swap request details provided in the request body.

post.summary: Submits a shift swap request by an employee.
post.description: This method returns 200 OK with the result if successful, or 400 Bad Request if the creation fails.
